BUREAU OF CIVIL AVIATION SECURITY 
(MINISTRY OF CIVIL AVIATION) 
GOVERNMENT OF INDIA 
‘A’  WING , JANPATH  BHAWAN , 
JANPATH, NEW DELHI -110001 
Date : 15.2.2005 
 
Circular No. 6/2005 
 
 
In continuation to this Bureau Circular No.29/2002 dated 
24.09.2002 the Personal Security Officers (PSOs) of Shri Shivraj Patil, 
Union Home Minister of India are permitted to carry their weapons and 
ammunition on their persons or in their hand baggage on board the flight.  
The weapons will be carried in fully unloaded condition i.e. weapons and 
ammunition shall be kept separately while accompanying the dignitary on 
board the aircraft.  
 
 
 
 
 
( R.C.Tayal) 
Commissioner of Security (CA) 
 
Distribution : As per standard list
